name: Oven Baked Vegan Meatball Subs
description: These Oven Baked Vegan Meatball Subs are a perfect easy family dinner for busy days, all the kids loved them! Great for parties or game-day food as well.
recipeIngredient: 6-8  sandwich rolls (check ingredients to ensure vegan)
1 jar your favorite pasta sauce (or make your own, about 3 cups)
1  bag non-dairy mozzarella style cheese shreds* (OR use homemade vegan mozzarella)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Chickpea Meatballs if you haven't already. I like to double the recipe and use 1 batch for spaghetti another night. Or make them ahead of time and freeze for easy weeknight meals.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Chickpea Meatballs if you haven't already. I like to double the recipe and use 1 batch for spaghetti another night. Or make them ahead of time and freeze for easy weeknight meals.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpea meatballs to a large pot on the stove and cover them with the pasta sauce. Warm over low-medium heat, coating the meatballs with the sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chickpea meatballs to a large pot on the stove and cover them with the pasta sauce. Warm over low-medium heat, coating the meatballs with the sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a roll with meatballs (3-4, depending on the size of your balls). Top with a little more sauce from the pot. Place the rolls close together on a baking sheet and top with non-dairy cheese shreds or homemade mozzarella.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill a roll with meatballs (3-4, depending on the size of your balls). Top with a little more sauce from the pot. Place the rolls close together on a baking sheet and top with non-dairy cheese shreds or homemade mozzarella.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for about 15-20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and hot. Remove from oven and serve. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for about 15-20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and hot. Remove from oven and serve. Enjoy!
